description: Alter surface fluxes to impose model climatology plus negative Atlantic Multidecadal Variability (AMV) anomalies of Sea Surface Temperature (SST) over the  North Atlantic (10N-65N).  Idealised AMV anomalies of SST will be provided by DCPP.  For groups that are unable to restore SSTs.
name: ImposeSSTAMVnegNAtlantic
rationale: To investigate the climate impacts of negative Atlantic Multidecadal Variability (AMV) anomalies.
longName: Impose negative AMV anomaly to sea surface temperatures in the north Atlantic
keywords: DCPP, SST, imposed, AMV-, negative AMV, negative Atlantic Multidecadal Variability anomaly
